description: Alterations to front porch; single storey rear extension with patio and glazed balustrade (replacing existing single storey rear extension and patio); external alterations to side elevation replacing ground floor window with door; replacement of first floor flank window and installation of two windows; replacement of existing first floor and loft rear windows (to existing rear roof extension) (removal of existing first floor rear bay window); replacement of existing first floor rear railings to terrace by glazed balustrade to rear and installation of additional pier to existing front boundary wall
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing/document title number(s): Proposed Plans, P-02 - Rev 02 - Floor Plans, P-03 - Rev 02 - Elevations and P-04 - Rev 03 - Section
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

| The privacy screens identified on the approved drawings listed under condition 2 shall be installed prior to first use of the hereby approved development. The privacy screens shall be retained for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of neighbouring properties in accordance with National Planning Policy Framework 2021 - section 12, policies D3 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), policies policy 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013), policy DAA of Ealing's Local Plan (Reg.18) and policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012).
